labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: audio playback of the bot is immediately stopped. Leaving and rejoining the VC will fix the issue. [Submitted for DV8FromTheWorld#6297]
data.expected_result: no change to the audio playback from the bot in the VC of Guild A
data.short_description: Bot disconnecting from an audio server in mutual Guild stops playback in current VoiceChannel
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a VoiceChannel (VC) in Guild A - Have a bot join the same VC in Guild A - Have the bot join a VC in Guild B, a mutually shared Guild - Have the bot play audio in the VC of Guild A. Playback could have also have been started before bot joined VC in Guild B - Have the bot sever the audio connection to the VC in Guild B (leave, not just switch channels)
